Sins of a grave character are in our borders, and unless there is an awakening such as we have not seen for some time which will convict and convert professed Sabbath keepers, they will die in their sins; and the punishment of Sodom and Gomorrah will be light in comparison with those who have had great light and 
                                                                           344
precious opportunities, but have been worldly minded, corrupt in thoughts and practices, and have not purified their souls by obeying the truth.
